extendedInfo.description: Teenage detectives, hair raising zombie mutants, blood-curdling experiments and a mad man who wants to rule the world! The Missing - A dangerous truth is an interactive hidden object web and mobile story app game.This interactive story based game has you searching for hidden dangers and solving cryptic puzzles within visually stunning environments.Features:* Zombies, Mutants and hidden dangers* Cryptic puzzles* Interactive storytelling and gameplay* Awesome art and detailed environments* Atmospheric soundtrack* Unlock cluesDare to uncover a dangerous truth...

reviews.title: Where\'s Waldo
reviews.comment: It kinda like ,Where\'s Waldo?, with better art work.  But that\'s about it. When u try to tap on a picture u found.  It just doesn\'t work. Tap to your hearts content, with no results.  2 stars for art work.  Would have been a great game
reviews.author: Carrie Ann Matassa

reviews.title: Couldn\'t even finish it.
reviews.comment: It was a good game, as far as I could tell before I had to stop playing. Had to restart it a few times after the \"Danger\" portion began. Then when it finally worked, it forced me to give my Email address and other information only to not let me continue playing once I gave it. I give it 1 star because the portion I did play was good.
reviews.author: Britney Durham

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great game! Really enjoy playin\' this.
reviews.author: Stephen Waldridge

reviews.title: Loved at first
reviews.comment: Was going to give 5, but after joyfully playing for 10 min, it takes me to a British Safety Council page, asks for my email, age, name. Since i couldn\'t bypass this, i entered this info, but it didn\'t even work when i hit enter, over & over. Can\'t get past this page, can\'t play anymore. Lame.
reviews.author: Lisa Vandenaker

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work...
reviews.comment: \"The Missing has stopped.\" That\'s the only thing that shows up when I click on the icon. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: JENNIFER BRADLEY

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I love it great for boredom
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Icecream sandwich
reviews.comment: Enjoying this game. Keep up the good work :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very acceptable.... thank god for zoom... cause I\'m blind as a a starnose mole.... u were waiting for me to say bat
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Heather
reviews.comment: Awesome graphic. Keeps freezing n stopping then have to restart.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I thot it very cute. And very short. I agree w/the description: a dark version of where\'s Waldo.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Threlkeld

reviews.title: love it!!!
reviews.comment: this is an awesome game with great graphix and storyline again I LOVE IT.....
reviews.author: Jose Camposano

reviews.title: Cool graffics...
reviews.comment: So far its been interesting. I like the way it was put together.
reviews.author: Kristina Smith

reviews.title: Grrrrrr
reviews.comment: Beautiful and fun...   well I think it would be fun if it actually worked made it through the gate puzzle, found the kid with the package and then I double click but nothing happens and It force closes every few minutes.  Uninstalling!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Continue?
reviews.comment: Pretty. I enjoy the artwork. Sometimes keep on crashing though. The e-mail thing does not can not continue through the story.
reviews.author: Noch Rao

reviews.title: I love this game!
reviews.comment: But when I had to give my information it wouldn\'t let me keep playing... Please fix!!!!!
reviews.author: Robert Sanderson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great graphics and great fun
reviews.comment: Well developed game takes me back to the Where\'s Waldo days but with a dark and twisted twist.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I just love hidden and mystery games.....
reviews.author: Jathea Thornwell

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: This game is alright for what kind of game it is!

reviews.comment: Great game overall. I just don\'t like that it tries to make you like it on TWITTER and other social media sites.\tSee title
